attributes.action: introduce measures to ensure seriously overweight people showing no willing to improve their condition are not given free healthcare.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Smokers, drinkers, drivers and the obese. All of these cost the NHS millions every year, and yet all but one are taxed to compensate. More concerning is that the only un-taxed group is the one that by far and away costs the most. I propose that severely overweight people showing no interest in improving their condition should be denied all forms of healthcare support.
